scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag $PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.build: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && echo $PACKAGE_VERSION && babel index.js -d ./build/$PACKAGE_VERSION
